Text: It is an era where vegetation is scarce
where once lush lands are transformed into endless barrens
where the world is shrouded in eternal night
and where mankind struggles for survival.
Resources are scarce and the importance of plants
The natural world has faded from the consciousness of the collective.
The relentless quest for more erodes patience and a sense of balance.
plants have become rarer and rarer
and the lush forests of yesteryear are fading into legend.
Some people have even forgotten what a 'forest' is
